channel.title: Client Error?
channel.description:
[code]********************************************************************************
* Welcome to the KillerScape Client *
********************************************************************************
'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] also this is in it [code]@echo off TITLE KillerScape Client color 04 echo ******************************************************************************** echo * Welcome to the KillerScape Client * echo ******************************************************************************** cd client JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI pause[/code] no matter WHAT client i download i get something along those lines

item.title: Client Error?
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

[code]********************************************************************************

  •                  Welcome to the KillerScape Client                       *

‘JAVA’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
also this is in it

@echo off TITLE KillerScape Client color 04 echo ******************************************************************************** echo * Welcome to the KillerScape Client * echo ******************************************************************************** cd client JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI pause
no matter WHAT client i download i get something along those lines

Read full topic
